title: Wild Bride
description: Spoiled rich girl Savannah has always had a lust for sexy men, a wild appetite for partying, and a blatant disregard for others. When she finds herself pregnant and alone after burning all her bridges, it looks like she'll be getting a taste of her own medicine. Stubborn and set in her ways, she pushes away the only person who really cares.  Billy has one goal, to convince Savannah that hope and happiness are still within reach. But somethings got to give.
author: Jill Sanders
